data.caption: Announcement under Regulation 30 (LODR)-Newspaper Publication
data.news_body: Pursuant to Regulation 30 of SEBI Listing Regulations please find enclosed copies of newspaper clippings relating to publication of Unaudited Financial Results (Standalone & Consolidated) for the quarter and nine months ended 31st December 2025.

data.caption: Disclosure Under Regulation 33 Of SEBI (Listing Obligation And Disclosure Requirements) Regulations. 2015
data.news_body: The Board of Directors at its meeting held on 30th January 2026 has adopted and taken on record the Unaudited Financial Results (Standalone & Consolidated) for the quarter and nine months ended 31st December 2025 alongwith Revenue Results Assets and Liabilities of the Company pursuant to Regulation 33 of SEBI LODR Regulations 2015.

data.caption: Disclosure Under Regulation 33 Of SEBI (Listing Obligation And Disclosure Requirements) Regulations. 2015
data.news_body: The Board of Directors at its meeting held on 30th January 2026 has adopted and taken on record the Unaudited Financial Results (Standalone & Consolidated) for the quarter and nine months ended 31st December 2025 alongwith Revenue Results Assets and Liabilities of the Company pursuant to Regulation 33 of SEBI LODR Regulations 2015.

data.caption: Board Meeting Intimation for Considering And To Take On Record The Unaudited Financial Results (Standalone & Consolidated) Of The Company For The Quarter And Nine Months Ended 31St December 2025
data.news_body: IFB Agro Industries Ltdhas informed BSE that the meeting of the Board of Directors of the Company is scheduled on 30/01/2026 inter alia to consider and approve Unaudited Financial Results (Standalone & Consolidated) of the Company for the quarter and nine months ended 31st December 2025 beside other matters.

data.caption: Announcement under Regulation 30 (LODR)-Newspaper Publication
data.news_body: Pursuant to Regulation 30 of SEBI Listing Regulations 2015 please find enclosed copies of newspaper advertisement published on January 5 2026 in the newspapers informing shareholders about the one-time Special Window for relodgement of transfer requests of physical shares.

data.descriptor: Certificate under Reg. 74 (5) of SEBI (DP) Regulations 2018
data.caption: Compliances-Certificate under Reg. 74 (5) of SEBI (DP) Regulations 2018
data.news_body: We enclose herewith a certificate as received under Regulation 74(5) of SEBI Depositories and Participants Regulations 2018 for the quarter ended 31st December 2025 as received from the RTA of the Company.

data.caption: Closure of Trading Window
data.news_body: In terms of SEBI ( Prohibition of SEBI and Insider Trading) Regulations 2015 trading by Designated persons and their immediate relatives in the listed securities of IFB Agro Industries Ltd. will remain closed from 1st January 2026 and the same will remain close till 48 hours after the announcement of Unaudited Financial Results (Standalone & Consolidated) for the quarter and nine months ending 31st December 2025 to the public.

data.caption: Announcement under Regulation 30 (LODR)-Newspaper Publication
data.news_body: Pursuant to Regulation 30 of SEBI Listing Regulations please find enclosed copies of Newspaper Advertisement published on November 20 2025 in the newspapers informing members about one-time Special Window for re-lodgment of transfer requests for physical shares.

data.caption: Announcement under Regulation 30 (LODR)-Newspaper Publication
data.news_body: Pursuant to Regulation 30 of SEBI LODR please find enclosed copies of newspaper clippings of the advertisement relating to publication of Unaudited Financial Results for the quarter and half year ended 30th September 2025 in the newspapers.

data.caption: Disclosure Under Regulation 33 Of SEBI (Listing Obligation And Disclosure Requirements) Regulations. 2015 For The Quarter And Half Year Ended September 30 2025.
data.news_body: The Board of Directors at its meeting held on 31st October 2025 has adopted and taken on record the Unaudited Financial Results ( Standalone & Consolidated) along with Segment wise Revenue Results Assets & Liabilities Balance Sheet and Cash Flow Statement for the quarter and half year ended 30th September 2025 in compliance with Regulation 33 of SEBI LODR.

data.caption: Disclosure Under Regulation 33 Of SEBI (Listing Obligation And Disclosure Requirements) Regulations. 2015 For The Quarter And Half Year Ended September 30 2025.
data.news_body: The Board of Directors at its meeting held on 31st October 2025 has adopted and taken on record the Unaudited Financial Results ( Standalone & Consolidated) along with Segment wise Revenue Results Assets & Liabilities Balance Sheet and Cash Flow Statement for the quarter and half year ended 30th September 2025 in compliance with Regulation 33 of SEBI LODR.

data.caption: Reply To The Clarification Sought On Volume/Price Movement Of The Shares Of The Company.
data.news_body: We wish to inform you that the Company has made all the disclosures as per Regulation 30 of SEBI LODR and to the best of our knowledge there is no impending material price sensitive information/announcement of the Company which may have a bearing on the price/volume behavior of the scrip.

data.caption: Clarification sought from IFB Agro Industries Ltd
data.news_body:
The Exchange has sought clarification from IFB Agro Industries Ltd on October 29 2025 with reference to significant movement in price in order to ensure that investors have latest relevant information about the company and to inform the market so that the interest of the investors is safeguarded.

The reply is awaited.

data.caption: Board Meeting Intimation for Considering The Unaudited Financial Results (Standalone & Consolidated) Of The Company For The Quarter And Half Year Ended 30Th September 2025.
data.news_body: IFB Agro Industries Ltdhas informed BSE that the meeting of the Board of Directors of the Company is scheduled on 31/10/2025 inter alia to consider and approve Unaudited Financial Results (Standalone & Consolidated) of the Company for the quarter and half year ended 30th September 2025.

data.descriptor: Certificate under Reg. 74 (5) of SEBI (DP) Regulations 2018
data.caption: Compliances-Certificate under Reg. 74 (5) of SEBI (DP) Regulations 2018
data.news_body: We enclose herewith a certificate in terms of Regulation 74(5) of SEBI Depositories and Participants Regulations Regulations 2018 for the quarter ended 30th September 2025 from CB Management (P) Ltd. the Registrar and Share Transfer Agent of the Company.

data.caption: Intimation Under Regulation 30 Of SEBI (Listing Obligations And Disclosure Requirements) Regulations 2015 - Closure Of Wholly Owned Subsidiary IFB Agro Marine (FZE) Sharjah UAE And Its Representative Office.
data.news_body: In continuation to our earlier letter dated 11th November 2024 on the subject matter we would like to inform that pursuant to Regulation 30 of the SEBI Listing Regulations 2015 and in terms of the approval granted by the Board of Directors of the Company the Wholly Owned Subsidiary of the Company namely IFB Agro Marine (FZE) formally registered at Sharjah International Airport engaged in the business of trading Marine Sea Food has been voluntarily liquidated/closed w.e.f 30th September 2025 along with its Representative Office in Dubai.

data.caption: Closure of Trading Window
data.news_body: The Trading Window for dealing in securities of the Company will be closed for all Designated Persons and their immediate relatives from 1st October 2025 and the same will remain closed/shut till 48 hours after the announcement of the Un-Audited Financial Results (Standalone & Consolidated) for the quarter and six months ending 30th September 2025 to the public.

data.caption: Announcement under Regulation 30 (LODR)-Newspaper Publication
data.news_body: Pursuant to Regulation 30 of SEBI Listing Regulations please find enclosed copies of advertisement published in newspaper informing the members about the one-time special window for re-lodgement of transfer requests of physical shares.

data.caption: Re-Lodgement Of Transfer Requests Of Physical Shares.
data.news_body: In terms of SEBI Circular dated July 2 2025 please find enclosed the report received from the Registrar and Share Transfer Agent of the Company i.e C B Management Services (P) Ltd on the status of the re-lodgment of transfer requests of physical shares for the months of July and August 2025.

data.caption: Announcement under Regulation 30 (LODR)-Change in Management
data.news_body: Pursuant to Regulation 30 of the Listing Regulations we hereby inform you that Mr. Siddhartha Basu has been redesignated as Head-Commercial & Integration Marine Division with immediate effect.

data.caption: Intimation Of Execution Of Business Transfer Agreement For Aquisition Through Slump Sale- Regulation 30(6) Of The SEBI Listing Regulations 2015.
data.news_body:
We wish to inform you that IFB Agro Industries Limited has entered into and executed  a Business Transfer Agreement (BTA) dated 30th May 2025 with Cargill India Private Limited for aquisition of its entire commercial compound shrimp feed and freshwater fish feed business undertaking in India as a going concern on a slump sale basis in accordance with the terms and conditions of the BTA.
Further we would like to inform you that the Company has completed all its formalities for the said aquisition and the Company has made the payment of total consideration of Rs. 110 crs (Rupees One Hundred and Ten Crores) subject to Working capital and certain other agreed adjustments in accordance with the terms of the BTA to Cargill India Pvt. Ltd through bank transfer on 31st July 2025.

data.caption: Announcement under Regulation 30 (LODR)-Change in Directorate
data.news_body: Pursuant to Regulation 30 of the SEBI Listing Regulations the members of IFB Agro Industries Ltd at the 43rd Annual General Meeting held on 30th July 2025 have approved the re-appointment of Mr. Arup Kumar Banerjee as Executive Vice Chairman of the Company w.e.f 30th July 2025 for a period of 2 years.

data.caption: Announcement under Regulation 30 (LODR)-Meeting Updates
data.news_body: Pursuant to Regulation 30 of the Listing Regulation the members of IFB Agro Industries Ltd at the 43rd Annual General Meeting of the Company have approved the appointment of M/s. Labh & Labh Associates Company Secretaries as the Secretarial Auditor of the Company for 5 Financial Year w.e.f 2025-26.

data.caption: Shareholder Meeting / Postal Ballot-Scrutinizers Report
data.news_body: We enclosed in terms of Regulation 30 of SEBI LODR a summary of the proceedings of the 43rd Annual General Meeting of the Company held on Wednesday 30th day of July 2025 at Raajkutir Rangmanch 89C Maulana Abul Kalam Azad Sarani Phool Bagan Kankurgachi Kolkata Wes Bengal Pin:-700054.

data.caption: Shareholder Meeting / Postal Ballot-Outcome of AGM
data.news_body: We write to inform you that the 43rd Annual General Meeting of the Company was duly convened and held on Wednesday the 30th day of July 2025. In this regard we are enclosing the proceeding of the Annual General Meeting.

data.caption: Announcement under Regulation 30 (LODR)-Newspaper Publication

data.news_body: We wish to inform you that the Board of Directors at their meeting held on 28th July 2025 based on the recommendation of the Audit Committee approved the appointment of Mr. Rajat Purkayastha Chartered Accountant (Membership No:-038741) as the Internal Auditor of the Company in place of Mr. Rajit Chatterjee with immediate effect.

A copy of the letter is attached for reference.

data.caption: Book Closure For The Financial Year 2024-25
data.news_body: The Register of Members and the Share Transfer Books of the Company will remain closed from July 24 2025 to July 30 2025 (both days inclusive) for the purpose of Annual General Meeting to be held on 30th July 2025.

data.caption: Announcement under Regulation 30 (LODR)-Newspaper Publication
data.news_body: In terms of Regulation 30 of SEBI Listing Regulations and in compliance with Section 108 of the Companies Act read with Rule 20 of the Companies (Management & Administration) Rules 2014 and the Secretarial Standards on General Meetings copies of newspaper clippings published on 8th July 2025 is enclosed.

data.caption: Notice Convening The 43Rd Annual General Meeting  & Annual Report For The Financial Year Ended 31St March 2025
data.news_body: We enclose in terms of Regulation 30 and Regulation 34 of the SEBI Listing Regulations the Annual Report including the Financial Statements of the Company for the Financial Year ended 31st March 2025 together with the notice dated 30th May 2025 convening the 43rd Annual General Meeting of the Company scheduled to be held on Wednesday July 30 2025 at 12:30 p.m (IST) at Raajkutir Rangmanch 89C Maulana Abul Kalam Azad Sarani PhoolBagan Kankurgachi Kolkata West Bengal-700054.

data.caption: Reg. 34 (1) Annual Report.
data.news_body:
We enclose in terms of Regulations 30 and 34 of the SEBI (Listing Obligations and Disclosure Requirements) Regulations 2015 a copy of the  Annual Report including the Financial Statements of the Company for the financial year ended 31st March 2025 together with the Notice dated 30th May 2025 convening the 43rd Annual General Meeting of the Company  scheduled to be held on Wednesday July 30 2025 at 12.30 P.M. (IST) at Raajkutir Rangmanch 89C Maulana Abul Kalam Azad Sarani Phoolbagan Kankurgachi Kolkata WestBengal-700054.  

The Annual Report is being sent to the Members who have registered their email ID with the Company/Depositories in electronic mode in compliance with the MCA & SEBI Circulars. 

 The Members can also access the Annual Report on the website of the Company at i.e. www.ifbagro.in.

data.caption: Closure of Trading Window
data.news_body: The trading Window for dealing in securities of the Company for the Designated persons and their immediate relatives will remain close from 1st July 2025 till the expiry of 48 hours after the announcement of the Un-Audited Financial Results (Standalone & Consolidated) for the quarter ending 30th June 2025 to the Public as per SEBI PIT Regulations and as per the provisions of the Code of Conduct of the Company.

data.caption: Intimation Of Annual General Meeting & Book Closure For The Financial Year 2024-25
data.news_body:
This is to inform that the 43rd Annual General Meeting of the Company will be held on Wednesday July 30 2025 at 12:30 p.m (IST) Raajkutir Rangmanch 89C Maulana Abul Kalam Azad Sarani Phool Bagan Kankurgachi Kolkata-700054.

The Register of Members and the Share transfer Books of the Company will be closed from 24th July 2025 to 30th July 2025 (both days inclusive) for the purpose of the 43rd Annual General Meeting.

data.caption: Announcement under Regulation 30 (LODR)-Credit Rating
data.news_body: Pursuant to Regulation 30 of the Listing Regulations we are pleased to inform that India Ratings and Research has affirmed IFB Agro Industries Limiteds existing Credit Rating at INDA+/Stable.

data.caption: Announcement under Regulation 30 (LODR)-Acquisition
data.news_body: Pursuant to Regulation 30 of SEBI (LODR) Regulations 2015 this is to inform that the Board of Directors of IFB Agro Industries Limited at their meeting held on 30th May 2025 has approved subject to execution of a Business Transfer Agreement to acquire from Cargill India Pvt. Ltd. it entire commercial compound shrimp feed and fresh water fish feed business undertaking in India as a going concern on a slump sale basis.

data.caption: Disclosure Under Regulation 30 Of SEBI (Listing Obligations And Disclosure Requirements) Regulations,2015 - Closure Of Operations Of Subsidiary.
data.news_body: Pursuant to Regulation 30 of the SEBI Listing Regulations, we would like to inform that the Company in its Board meeting held today i.e 11th November, 2024, has approved the proposal to permanently close its Wholly Owned Subsidiary IFB Agro Marine (FZE) situated in UAE. Henceforth IFB Agro Marine (FZE) would cease to be subsidiary of the Company.

data.caption: Update on board meeting
data.news_body: The Board Meeting to be held on 09/08/2024 has been revised to 13/08/2024 We write in reference to our earlier letter dated 3rd August, 2024 on the captioned subject. This is to inform that the meeting of the Board of Directors of IFB Agro Industries Limited has been rescheduled on Tuesday, 13th August, 2024. The agenda will remain same as intimated earlier.

data.caption: Announcement under Regulation 30 (LODR)-Newspaper Publication

data.caption: Board Meeting Intimation for Intimation Of Board Meeting To Consider The Unaudited Financial Results (Standalone And Consolidated) Of The Company For The Quarter Ended 30Th June, 2024.
data.news_body: IFB AGRO INDUSTRIES LTD.has informed BSE that the meeting of the Board of Directors of the Company is scheduled on 09/08/2024 ,inter alia, to consider and approve the Unaudited Financial Results (Standalone & Consolidated) of the Company for the quarter ended 30th June, 2024 beside other matters.

data.caption: Shareholder Meeting / Postal Ballot-Scrutinizer''s Report
data.news_body: We enclose in terms of Regulation 30 of the SEBI Listing Regulations 2015, a summary of the proceedings of the 42nd Annual General Meeting (''AGM'') alongwith the Scrutinizer''s Report of the Company held on Monday, 29th day of July, 2024, at 12:30 p.m and concluded at 1:55 p.m at Club Ecohub, Ecospace Business Park, Plot No. IIF/11, Action Area-II, Rajarhat, Newtown , kolkata-700160.

data.caption: Announcement under Regulation 30 (LODR)-Cessation
data.news_body: We write to inform you that Mr. Sudip Kumar Mukherji ( DIN 02764262), Non Executive Non- Independent Director has tendered his resignation from the office Directorship of the Company with effect from the closure of business hours on 29th July, 2024, due to completion of tenure.

data.caption: Announcement under Regulation 30 (LODR)-Change in Directorate
data.news_body: We write to inform you that Mr. Sudip Kumar Mukherji Non Executive Non Independent Director has tendered his resignation from the Directorship of the Company due to completion of tenure.This is to further inform that based on the recommendation of Nomination and Remuneration Committee, the Board of Directors of the Company vide resolution by circulation dated 29th July, 2024 have appointed Mr. Sanjoy Dutta ( DIN 07192675) as an Independent Director of the Company for a period of 5 years w.e.f. 30th July, 2024, subject to approval of shareholders.

data.caption: Announcement under Regulation 30 (LODR)-Appointment of Statutory Auditor/s
data.news_body: We would like to inform you that M/s BSR & Co. LLP, Chartered Accountants, was appointed as Statutory Auditors of the Company at 37th AGM until the conclusion of 42nd AGM of the Company.Accordingly, the tenure of M/s BSR & Co. LLP as Statutory Auditors of the Company has expired with the conclusion of 42nd AGM for the F.Y 2023-24 which is held and concluded today i.e. 29th July, 2024.Further, the Members o the Company at its 42nd AGM held on 29th July, 2024 has approved the appointment of M/s MSKA & Associates, Chartered Accountants ( Firm Registration No. 105047W) for a term of 5 years to hold office from the conclusion of 42nd AGM till the conclusion of 47th AGM of the Company.

data.caption: Shareholder Meeting / Postal Ballot-Outcome of AGM
data.news_body: We write to inform you that the 42nd Annual General Meeting of the Company was duly convened on Monday, 29th day of July, 2024, at Club Ecohub, Ecospace Business park, Plot No. IIF/11, Action Area-II, Rajarhat Newtown, Kolkata-700160. The meeting started at 12:30 p.m and concluded at 1:55 p.m.

data.caption: Announcement under Regulation 30 (LODR)-Change in Directorate
data.news_body: Pursuant to Regulation 30 of SEBI Listing Obligations & Disclosure Requirements) Regulations 2015, it is informed that Mr. Hari Ram Agarwal and Mr. Manoj Kumar Vijay have resigned from the Directorship of the Company with effect from the closure of business hours on July, 25, 2024 post completion of their tenure as Independent Directors of the Company pursuant to Section 149(11) of the Companies Act, 2013.

data.caption: Shareholder Meeting / Postal Ballot-Notice of Postal Ballot
data.news_body: We enclose herewith a copy of the notice of Postal ballot alongwith the Explanatory Statement seeking approval of the members of the Company on the resolution being Special Resolution through postal ballot.

data.descriptor: Certificate under Reg. 74 (5) of SEBI (DP) Regulations, 2018
data.caption: Compliances-Certificate under Reg. 74 (5) of SEBI (DP) Regulations, 2018
data.news_body: We enclose in terms of Regulation 74(5) of the SEBI (Depositories and Participants) Regulations 2018, for the quarter  ended 30th June, 2024 as received from CB Management Services (P) Ltd, the Registrar and Share Transfer Agent (RTA) of the Company.

data.caption: Reply To The Clarification Sought On Volume/Price Movement Of The Shares Of The  Company.
data.news_body: This is to inform that the Company has made all the necessary disclosures pursuant to Regulation 30 of SEBI LODR and till date there is no impending material price sensitive information / announcement of the Company which may have a bearing on the price/volume behaviour in the script. The Company always adheres to make material price sensitive disclosures to Stock Exchanges within the stipulated time.

''Business Standard'' (English), and 2. ''Aajkal'' (Bengali) in Local vernacular language.

data.caption: Annual Report For The Financial Year End 31St March, 2024.
data.news_body: Pursuant to Regulation 30 we are enclosing the Annual Report alongwith the AGM Notice for the Financial year ended 31st March, 2024.

data.caption: Reg. 34 (1) Annual Report.
data.news_body: We enclose in terms of Regulation 30 and 34 of the SEBI (Listing Obligations and Disclosure Requirements) Regulations, 2015  the Annual Report of the Company for the Financial Year ended 31st March, 2024.

data.caption: Clarification sought from IFB Agro Industries Ltd
data.news_body:
The Exchange has sought clarification from IFB Agro Industries Ltd on July 05, 2024 with reference to significant movement in price, in order to ensure that investors have latest relevant information about the company and to inform the market so that the interest of the investors is safeguarded.

The reply is awaited.

data.caption: Announcement under Regulation 30 (LODR)-Newspaper Publication
data.news_body: Publication of Notice convening the 42nd Annual General Meeting of IFB Agro Industries Ltd to be held on 29th July, 2024 in compliance with MCA Circulars.

data.caption: Intimation Of  Book Closure For The Financial Year 2023-24
data.news_body: The Register of Members and the Share Transfer Books of the Company will remain closed from 23rd July, 2024 to 29th July, 2024 (both days inclusive) for the purpose of the 42nd Annual General Meeting  of the Company for the Financial Year 2023-24 to be held on 29th July, 2024.

data.caption: Intimation Of Annual General Meeting & Book Closure For The Financial Year 2023-24
data.news_body: This is to inform that the 42nd Annual General Meeting (''AGM'') of the Company will be held on Monday, July 29, 2024 at Club Ecohub, Ecospace Business Park, Plot No. IIF/11, Action Area II, Rajarhat Newtown, Kolkata-700160 in conformity with the provisions of the Companies Act, 2013 (''Act'') and the Rules thereunder read with the Circulars issued by Ministry of Corporate Affairs, Government of India.The Register of Members and Share Transfer Books will remain closed from 23rd July, 2024 to 29th July, 2024 (both days inclusive) for the purpose of the Annual General Meeting.

data.caption: Closure of Trading Window
data.news_body: In terms of SEBI (Prohibition & Insider Trading) Regulations, 2015, and the provisions of the Code of Conduct the Trading Window for dealing in the Securities of the Company by the Designated persons and their immediate relatives will be closed from 1st July, 2024 and the same will remain closed/shut till 48 hours after the announcement of Un-audited Financial Results (Standalone & Consolidated) for the quarter ending 30th June, 2024.

data.caption: Announcement under Regulation 30 (LODR)-Newspaper Publication
data.news_body: We enclose copies of Newspaper clippings of the advertisement published relating to Financial Results on 29th May, 2024.

data.caption: Compliances-Reg.24(A)-Annual Secretarial Compliance
data.news_body: We enclose in terms of Regulation 24A of the SEBI (LODR) Regulations, 2015 the Annual Secretarial Compliance Report of the Company for the Financial Year ended 31st March, 2024.

data.caption: Announcement under Regulation 30 (LODR)-Appointment of Statutory Auditor/s
data.news_body: The Board of Directors at the meeting held on 28th May, 2024 has approved the appointment of M/s MSKA & Associates, Chartered Accountants as the Statutory Auditors of the Company for a period of 5 years,  from the conclusion of the 42nd Annual General Meeting till the conclusion of the 47th Annual General Meeting, subject to approval of the shareholders in the ensuing Annual General Meeting.

data.caption: Announcement under Regulation 30 (LODR)-Change in Directorate
data.news_body: The Board at its meeting held today i.e May 28, 2024, was pleased to appoint/reappoint:-a. Dr. Janardan Anna Gore as an Independent Director for a term of 3 years w.e.f  28th May, 2024.b. Mr. Bikramjit Nag, Chairman of the Company for a period of 5 years with effect from 26th January, 2025.

data.caption: APPROVAL OF AUDITED FINANCIAL RESULTS (STANDALONE AND CONSOLIDATED) FOR THE QUARTER AND YEAR ENDED 31St MARCH, 2023 IN COMPLIANCE WITH REGULATION 33 AND 30 OF SEBI (LISTING OBLIGATIONS AND DISCLOSURE REQUIREMENTS) REGULATIONS, 2015.
data.news_body: The Board of Directors of the Company in its meeting held on 30th May, 2023 has adopted and taken on record the Audited Financial Results (Standalone & Consolidated) along with the Segment Report, Statement of Assets and Liabilities and Cash Flow Statement thereupon for the Quarter and Financial year ended March 31, 2023, a copy of which is enclosed in compliance to the provisions of Regulation 33 of the SEBI (Listing Obligations and Disclosure Requirements Regulations), 2015. The said results were reviewed by the Audit committee at its meeting held prior to the board meeting. Please also find enclosed Reports from the Statutory Auditors of the Company on the Standalone and Consolidated Financial Results.
